alert.note: Alert for Northern Washoe County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:20PM PST until December 14 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM MONDAY TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches...except 4 to 8 inches above 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph through Monday. * WHERE...Surprise Valley California and Northern Washoe County. * WHEN...From 4 PM Monday to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become slick and hazardous. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since it takes longer to stop on slick roadways. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
